name: George R.R. Martin
talk: A reader lives a thousand lives before he dies...The man who never reads lives only one.There is more treasure in books than in all the pirate’s loot on Treasure Island.

name: John Smith
talk: I find television very educating. Every time somebody turns on the set, I go into the other room and read a book.You can never get a cup of tea large enough or a book long enough to suit me.

name: Ray Bradbury
talk: So please, oh please, we beg, we pray, go throw your TV set away, and in its place you can install a lovely bookshelf on the wall. Let’s be reasonable and add an eighth day to the week that is devoted exclusively to reading.
